name: GREED (Hernan Saez)
description:
Your goal in GREED is to collect as many points as you can in less 30 seconds. 

But it won't be easy.

Every point you get also has some impact on your health. Finding the right balance between life and the final score is the best way to succeed... or is it?

In GREED, levels are reset every 24 hours so you have plenty of time for replaying them in order to achieve the maximum score. 

  • Controls: Use your keyboard's arrows to move left and right.

Feedback is highly appreciated since the game is still on a prototype phase. Feel free to leave a comment based on your experience and what can be improved.

Thanks for playing!
